message.content:
{"id": "15899", "title": "Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time", "description": "When selecting Close All Saved from the file menu, the file f1.txt is not always closed, even though no changes have been made.", "OB": "Closing all saved files from the file menu should close the file f1.txt when no changes have been made.", "EB": "Closing all saved files from the file menu does not close the file f1.txt when no changes have been made.", "SR": "Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, perform the following steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Select Close All Saved from the file menu."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
